short.en:
This plugin let you notify another application about changes in inventoy items.
Then, an API call to this other application can be performed to reflect this change into this other application.
short.fr:
Ce greffon vous permet de notifier, à une autre application, des changements relatifs à un élément d'inventaire.
Un appel API peut alors être exécuté, pour reporter ce changement dans cette autre application.

long.en:
This plugin let you notify another application about changes in inventoy items.
Then, an API call to this other application can be performed to reflect this change into this other application.
See the plugin wiki on github for the user manual
long.fr:
